articles.description: Bitcoin (BTC) price is trading with a bearish bias, coming on the back of Grayscale (GBTC) dumping as investors seize the opportunity to redeem their Grayscale trust, selling BTC to the open market.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin price has recorded double-digit losses since spot ETFs started trading on January 11, 8% drop on Friday.

articles.title: Oil prices steady despite Middle East tensions, but risks are rising - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Despite diverting supplies from the Suez Canal, tensions in the Red Sea have so far had a muted impact on energy prices.
